project.name: C-C843A-GIMP-01-ST01-DT03-DF12-CF01-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C843A-GIMP-01-ST01-DT03-DF12-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved jpg file Creates a union that can be either an int or a char *. If input is a non-zero number, set union to that number, else set union to the input string. Try to access the union as a string, regardless of how it is set. Seg fault if the input is a non-zero number.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
